text-node.description: Standard pipeline for payment method selection.
Pipeline for authorizing the payment method.
This pipeline create a payment request at AltaPay.
This pipeline redirects the user to the payment page.
When a payment is succesfull, this pipeline is called and orders and orders are updated.
This pipeline is for asynchronous payments. A final notification with the payment status will be send later.

decision-node.description: The status will be changed to NEW, but only if it's not already NEW

text-node.description: This pipeline is for asynchronous payments, when the aquier returns an answer for payment request.

decision-node.description: The status will be changed to NEW, but only if it's not already NEW

text-node.description: Find the order by order number.
Cancels an order based on order number.
This pipeline verifies, that the IP of the responses originates from AltaPay.
If the merchant wants to handle chargeback notifications, the merchant would need, make their implementation here.
Pipeline to redirect the user to the confirmation page.
